titleStmt.title: To the Parliament, the Army, and all the wel-affected in the nation, who have been faithful to the good old cause.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.M. for Giles Calvert, at the Black-Spread-Eagle near the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Isaac Penington the younger.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
